      Crime
      Buddha Bowls Robbed By Armed Suspect
      January 8, 2020 by Katherine Swartz

      A business on the 900 block of Embarcadero Del Mar was robbed late Wednesday afternoon, according to Raquel Zick, Santa Barbara County Sheriff’s Office spokesperson. 

      The suspect, described as a Hispanic male in his late 20s or early 30s wearing a hooded sweatshirt and jeans, was armed and took an “undisclosed” amount of money. He was last seen running toward Del Playa Drive. 

      The press release did not state the name of the business, but a Nexus reporter on the scene confirmed that the restaurant was Buddha Bowls. 

      The investigation remains ongoing. Anyone with information regarding this incident can call the sheriff’s office at 805-681-4171 or leave an anonymous tip here. 

      Sean Crommelin contributed reporting.
